bio:
Rodolfo Cossovich is Clinical Instructor of Arts at NYU Shanghai. He is also the director of his own organization, Koding Kreators. He holds a degree in Engineering with specialization in Telecommunications from Escuela Superior Técnica del Ejército in Argentina.

Professor Cossovich has co-founded several projects with focus on Open Source Hardware both for robotics, education and electrical vehicles. He has successfully crowdfunded some of this projects and his work covered by major press outlets such as Popular Mechanics, CNN and CCTV. He is also an active member of the maker and entrepreneur community in Shanghai.

Research Interests

  • Educational Technology
  • Electrical Vehicles

Courses Taught

  • Animatronics
  • Introduction to Robotics

Education

  • Engineering, with specialization in Telecommunications

             Escuela Superior Tecnica del Ejercito Argentino, 2004
